name: imap-lambda-layer
description: A lightweight AWS Lambda Layer for interacting with IMAP servers

scripts.clean:
echo '
ğŸ§¹ Cleaning artifacts:
' && rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist
scripts.build:
echo '
ğŸ”¨ Building Lambda Layer:
' && mkdir -p dist/nodejs && cp -r src/* dist/nodejs/ && cp package*.json dist/nodejs/
scripts.install-deps:
echo '
ğŸ“¦ Installing dependencies:
' && cd dist/nodejs && npm install --production
scripts.zip:
echo '
ğŸ“¦ Creating zip package:
' && cd dist && zip -r imap-lambda-layer.zip nodejs
scripts.package: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build && npm run -s install-deps && npm run -s zip
scripts.test:
echo '
ğŸ§ª Running tests:
' && node --test test/*.mjs
